About

Vayesta has been designed such that it is :

  • Easy to use:

    The code has been developed to be easily integrated with further Python scripting language capabilites.

  • Flexible:

    Vayesta can perform ab-initio calculations….

  • Open to participation:

    Vayesta has been released under GNU Lesser General Public License version 3.0 or any later version.
